editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-6r: Private prayers offered by one አስበሮም (a man, baptismal name ሰበነ ጊዮርጊስ), (apparently his wife, ዕሤተ ማርያም, is often mentioned secondarily above his name), to Mary on behalf of his family, etc. F-15r: A Collection of Prayers and Supplications under the title, ስብሐተ ፍቁር, arranged by the 318 Orthodox Fathers, to give counsel to people facing problems. F-17v: Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Mary, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡. F-18v: Image of Mary’s Assumption, መልክአ፡ ፍልሰታ፡ ለማርያም፡. Répertoire 213. F-20r: Image of Mary, incipit: ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምኪ: አምሳለ: ስቴ: ወይን: መጥለለ: . . ., Répertoire 177. EMIP 499. F-25r: Image of Mary, Mälk‘a Maryam, መልክአ፡ ማርያም፡, Répertoire 220; MG 735ff.; Incipit: ሰላም ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምኪ ሐዋዝ። F-26r: Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace,” እሴብሕ: ጸጋኪ: ማርያም: ወእስእለኪ፡. Not listed in Répertoire ; cf. EMIP 203; cp. Chaine 343. F. Image of Samuel, Not in Répertoire . Incipit ሰላም ላከ ማኅፈደ መንፈስ አዚዝ። F-27r: Image of Qirqos, መልክአ፡ቂርቆስ፡. Incipit: ሰላም ለከ ቂርቆስ ሕፃን። Not in Répertoire. F-28r: Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace, Clothed in Golden Dress” Répertoire 345. EMIP 733. Incipit : እሴብሕ ጸጋኪ ኦዑጽፍተ ልብሰ ወርቅ. F: Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace, O My Lady Mary, Fruitful Tree.” Incipit: እሴብሕ: ጸጋኪ: ኦእግዝእትየ: ማርያም: ዕፅ: ልምሉምት፡. Not listed in Répertoire ; EMIP 701. : Hymn to Mary, “I Praise Thy Grace, O My Lady Mary, Who Makes Me Grow like my Mother. Not listed in Répertoire
